meanings.definition: A type of directional antenna used in telecommunications.
meanings.sent1: The yagi helped boost the signal for better reception.
meanings.sent2: The technician installed a yagi on the roof to improve the network connection.
meanings.sent3: When the yagi antenna started talking, everyone was surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her focus was like a yagi, always pointing in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The yagi antenna stood tall, reaching out to catch the signals in the air.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Yagi greeted us warmly at the event.
meanings.sent2: Yagi-san is a common surname in Japan.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat answered to the name Yagi.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of names, Yagi shone brightly like a star.
meanings.sent5: Yagi's smile was as welcoming as a sunny day.
